BlueArchive_Aris:CustomGameCard.NAME: Millennium Quest
BlueArchive_Aris:CustomGameCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL (It's still just an illustration, but it can be improved!)
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.
Deal !D! damage to a random enemy %1 times.
Your next Attack deals !M! additional damage.
Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.
Enemy loses 1% Strength for the rest of this turn.
Exhaust a card from your hand.
Exhaust a random card from your hand.
Shuffle an *Insight into your draw pile.
Exhaust all cards in your hand.
Discard all cards in your hand.
Add a random Attack to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Add a random Skill to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Add a random Power to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Add a random Card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Upgrade a card in your hand.
Upgrade %1 random card(s) in your hand.
Upgrade ALL cards in your hand.
Create a copy of a card in your hand.
Add a copy of this card to your discard pile.
Shuffle a *Wound into your draw pile.
Shuffle a *Dazed into your draw pile.
Shuffle a *Void into your draw pile.
Shuffle a *Burn into your draw pile.
Add a *Burn into your discard pile.
Add a *Wound into your discard pile.
Upgrade a random card in your deck.
When this card is drawn, lose 1 Energy.
